newsitem.title: USA: American Exploration buys interests in Ancon.
newsitem.headline: American Exploration buys interests in Ancon.

text.p: American Exploration Co said Monday that it has bought the limited partnership interests held by affiliates of New York Life Insurance Co in Ancon Partnership Ltd.
American Exploration, which serves as general partner in Ancon, said the purchase price was about $9 million cash, net of acquired working capital.
The company said estimated proved reserves of the acquired interest totalled 2.3 million barrels of oil equivalent as of September 30.
Separately, the company said it has budgeted aabout $76 million for land, seismic and drilling activity and expect to participate in about 130 gross wells in 1997.
